GR13bhnstcau:0: ANALYTIC VERSION according to BHELA conventions:
GR13bhnstcau:13: dviṣmas tvāṃ tvāṃ stumas tubhyaṃ mantrayāmo 'mbikāpate |
GR13bhnstcau:14: ativāllabhyataḥ sādhu viśvaṅ no dhṛtavān asi || 4
GR13bhnstcau:17: bhinneṣv api na bhinnaṃ yac chinneṣv achinnam eva ca |
GR13bhnstcau:26: śivajñānaṃ svato dugdhaṃ dehy ehi harahaṃsa naḥ || 10
GR13bhnstcau:33: bhagavan bhava bhāvatkaṃ bhāvaṃ bhāvayituṃ ruciḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:35: yāvajjīvaṃ jagannātha kartavyam idam astu naḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:44: nāmā7pi dhyāyatāṃ dhyānaiḥ kim anyālambanaiḥ phalam || 19
GR13bhnstcau:46: ślāghyās te śāmbhavīṃ bhūtim upabhoktuṃ ya udyatāḥ || 20
GR13bhnstcau:47: kaḥ panthā yena na prāpyaḥ kā ca vāṅ no7cyase yayā |
GR13bhnstcau:48: kiṃ dhyānaṃ yena na dhyeyaḥ kiṃ vā kiṃ nā7si yat prabho || 21
GR13bhnstcau:49: arcito 'yam ayaṃ dhyāta eṣa toṣita ity ayam |
GR13bhnstcau:50: rasaḥ srotaḥsahasreṇa tvayi me bhava vardhatām || 22
GR13bhnstcau:58: bhakticintāmaṇiṃ śārvaṃ tataḥ prāpya na kiṃ jitam || 26
GR13bhnstcau:60: jñeyo 'si kila ke 'py ete ye tvāṃ jānanti dhūrjaṭe || 27
GR13bhnstcau:61: nirguṇo 'pi guṇajñānāṃ jñeya eko jayaty ajaḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:62: niṣkāmo 'pi prakṛtyā yaḥ kāmanānāṃ paraṃ phalam || 28
GR13bhnstcau:63: śrīratnāmṛtalābhāya kliṣṭaṃ yatra na kaiḥ suraiḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:64: tat kṣīrodadam aiśvaryaṃ tavai7va sahajaṃ vibho || 29
GR13bhnstcau:65: namo bhaktyā nṛṇāṃ muktyai bhavate bhava te 'vate |
GR13bhnstcau:66: smṛtyā nutyā ca dadate śambhave śaṃ bhave 'bhave || 30
GR13bhnstcau:68: vedyaṃ kiṃ karma vā nātha nā8nantyāya tvayā9rpyate || 31
GR13bhnstcau:70: tasya te nātha kāryāṇāṃ ko vetti kiyatī gatiḥ || 32
GR13bhnstcau:72: upary upari dhāvanti labdhuṃ dhāma namāmi tam || 33
GR13bhnstcau:74: iti śaktilatā yasya puṣpitā pātv asau bhavaḥ || 34
GR13bhnstcau:75: bhramo na labhyate yasya bhrāntāntaḥkaraṇair api |
GR13bhnstcau:76: dūragair api yasyā7nto durgam astaṃ stumo mṛḍam || 35
GR13bhnstcau:77: namaḥ stutau smṛtau dhyāne darśane sparśane tathā |
GR13bhnstcau:80: smayena tvanmayo 'smī7ti māmi nā8tmani kiṃ mudā || 37
GR13bhnstcau:83: sūkṣmo 'pi cet trilokī9yaṃ kalāmātraṃ kathaṃ tava |
GR13bhnstcau:84: sthūlo 'tha kiṃ sudarśo na brahmādibhir api prabho || 39
GR13bhnstcau:85: vācya eṣāṃ tvam eve7ti nā7bhaviṣyad idaṃ yadi |
GR13bhnstcau:86: kaḥ kleśaṃ deva vāgjāleṣv akariṣyat sudhīs tadā || 40
GR13bhnstcau:87: krameṇa karmaṇā kena kayā vā prajñayā prabho |
GR13bhnstcau:91: aho kṣetrajñatā se9yaṃ kāryāya mahate satām |
GR13bhnstcau:92: yayā9nantaphalāṃ bhaktiṃ vapanti tvayy amī prabho || 43
GR13bhnstcau:93: mahatī9yam aho māyā tava māyin yayā0vṛtaḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:95: ārambhe bhava sarvatra karma vā karaṇādi vā |
GR13bhnstcau:96: viśvam astu svatantras tu kartā tatrai7kako bhavān || 45
GR13bhnstcau:99: doṣo 'pideva ko doṣas tvām āptuṃ yaḥ samāsthitaḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:100: guṇo 'pi ca guṇaḥ ko nu tvāṃ nā8ptuṃ yaḥ samāsthitaḥ || 47
GR13bhnstcau:101: rāgo 'py astu jagannātha mama tvayy eva yaḥ sthitaḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:103: aho mahad idaṃ karma deva tvadbhāvanātmakam |
GR13bhnstcau:114: labhyate bhava kutrā7ṃśe paraḥ pratinidhis tava || 53
GR13bhnstcau:115: nirdvandve nirupādhau ca tvayy ātmani sati prabho |
GR13bhnstcau:119: yā yā dik tatra na kvā7si sarvaḥ kālo bhavanmayaḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:120: iti labdho 'pi karhi tvaṃ lapsyase nātha kathyatām || 56
GR13bhnstcau:126: prastāvya hara saṃhartuṃ tvattaḥ ko 'nyaḥ kaviḥ kṣamaḥ || 59
GR13bhnstcau:127: namaḥ sadasatāṃ kartum asattvaṃ sattvam eva vā |
GR13bhnstcau:129: trailokye 'py atra yo yāvān ānandaḥ kaścid īkṣyate |
GR13bhnstcau:130: sa bindur yasya taṃ vande devam ānandasāgaram || 61
GR13bhnstcau:134: anāditve 'pi viśvasya bhoktre bhava namo 'stu te || 63
GR13bhnstcau:138: smṛte yasmin prasīdanti matayas taṃ śivaṃ stumaḥ || 65
GR13bhnstcau:141: kukarmā9pi yam uddiśya devaṃ syāt sukṛtaṃ param |
GR13bhnstcau:142: sukṛtasyā7pi saukṛtyaṃ yato 'nyatra na so 'si bhoḥ || 67
GR13bhnstcau:143: eṣa muṣṭyā gṛhīto 'si dṛṣṭa eṣa kva yāsi naḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:145: stumas tvām ṛgyajuḥsāmnāṃ śukrataḥ parataḥ param |
GR13bhnstcau:148: dharmagrāmaḥ pravṛtto yas tvatto na sa kuto bhavet || 70
GR13bhnstcau:150: jñānānandaṃ ca nirdvandvaṃ deva vṛtvā vivṛṇvate || 71
GR13bhnstcau:152: māyām ekanimeṣeṇa muṣṇaṃs tāṃ pātu naḥ śivaḥ || 72
GR13bhnstcau:153: vairāgyasya gatiṃ gurvīṃ jñānasya paramāṃ śriyam |
GR13bhnstcau:154: naiḥspṛhyasya parāṃ koṭiṃ bibhratāṃ tvaṃ prabho prabhuḥ || 73
GR13bhnstcau:155: brahmaṇo 'pi bhavān brahma kasya ne8śas tvam īśituḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:156: jagatkalyāṇakalyāṇaṃ kiyat tvam iti vetti kaḥ || 74
GR13bhnstcau:157: kim anyair bandhubhiḥ kiṃ ca suhṛdbhiḥ svāmibhis tathā |
GR13bhnstcau:158: sarvasthāne mame8śa tvaṃ ya uddhartā bhavārṇavāt || 75
GR13bhnstcau:161: gāyatryā gīyate yasya dhiyāṃ tejaḥ pracodakam |
GR13bhnstcau:162: codayed api kaccin naḥ sa dhiyaḥ satpathe prabhuḥ || 77
GR13bhnstcau:163: aṣṭamūrte kim ekasyām api mūrtau na naḥ sthitim |
GR13bhnstcau:164: śāśvatīṃ kuruṣe yad vā tuṣṭaḥ sarvaṃ kariṣyasi || 78
GR13bhnstcau:168: śaktir yā te tayā nātha ko manasvī na vismitaḥ || 80
GR13bhnstcau:170: ekavīrā smṛtir yasya taṃ smarāmaḥ smaradviṣam || 81
GR13bhnstcau:171: jayanti gītayo yāsāṃ sa geyaḥ parameśvaraḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:173: bhavān iva bhavān eva bhaved yadi paraṃ bhava |
GR13bhnstcau:176: sa mahyaṃ dehi taṃ mantraṃ tvanmantraḥ syāṃ yathā prabho || 84
GR13bhnstcau:177: bhārūpaḥ satyasaṃkalpas tvam ātmā yasya so 'py aham |
GR13bhnstcau:178: saṃsārī9ti kim īśai7ṣa svapnaḥ so 'pi kutas tvayi || 85
GR13bhnstcau:179: tad abhaṅgi tad agrāmyaṃ tad ekam upapattimat |
GR13bhnstcau:181: kṣamaḥ kāṃ nā8padaṃ hantuṃ kāṃ dātuṃ sampadaṃ na vā |
GR13bhnstcau:185: nirbhayaṃ yad yad ānandamayam ekaṃ yad avyayam |
GR13bhnstcau:186: padaṃ dehy ehi me deva tūrṇaṃ tat kiṃ pratīkṣase || 89
GR13bhnstcau:192: nātha prārthayamānānāṃ tvad ṛte kā parā gatiḥ || 92
GR13bhnstcau:193: tvayy anicchati kaḥ śambho śaktaḥ kubjayituṃ tṛṇam |
GR13bhnstcau:194: tvadicchānugṛhītas tu vahed brāhmīṃ dhuraṃ na kaḥ || 93
GR13bhnstcau:196: nameyuḥ kaṃ paraṃ kaṃ vā namayeyur na dhīdhanāḥ || 94
GR13bhnstcau:201: ko guṇair adhikas tvattas tvattaḥ ko nirguṇo 'dhikaḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:202: iti nātha numaḥ kiṃ tvāṃ kiṃ nindāmo na manmahe || 97
GR13bhnstcau:204: tat pātum api ko 'nyo 'laṃ kim u dātuṃ jagatpate || 98
GR13bhnstcau:206: tvattas tvadbhaktim evā8ptuṃ prārthaye nātha sarvathā || 99
GR13bhnstcau:210: svāmin so 'sī7ti niścitya kas tvāṃ na śaraṇaṃ gataḥ || 101
GR13bhnstcau:211: bhuktvā bhogān bhavabhrāntiṃ hitvā lapsye paraṃ padam |
GR13bhnstcau:212: ity āśaṃse9ha śobheta śambhau bhaktimataḥ param || 102
GR13bhnstcau:213: nātha svapne 'pi yat kuryāṃ brūyāṃ vā sādhv asādhu vā |
GR13bhnstcau:215: jyotiṣām api yaj jyotis tatra tvaddhāmni dhāvataḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:217: manye nyastapadaḥ so 'pi kṣemye mokṣasya vartmani |
GR13bhnstcau:218: manorathaḥ sthito yasya seviṣye śivam ity ayam || 105
GR13bhnstcau:221: trilokyām iha kas trātas tritāpyā no7patāpitaḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:222: tasmai namo 'stu te yas tvaṃ tannirvāṇāmṛtahradaḥ || 107
GR13bhnstcau:224: niśchadmā ced bhaved eṣā kiṃphale9ti tvayo9cyatām || 108
GR13bhnstcau:225: tac cakṣur īkṣyase yena sā gatir gamyase yayā |
GR13bhnstcau:226: phalaṃ tad aja jātaṃ yat tvatkathākalpapādapāt || 109
GR13bhnstcau:227: śreyasā śreya evai7tad upari tvayi yā sthitiḥ |
GR13bhnstcau:232: kalpayann api ko 'py eko nirvikalpo jayaty ajaḥ || 112
GR13bhnstcau:234: jñānadīpena deva tvāṃ kadā nu syām upasthitaḥ || 113
GR13bhnstcau:235: nimeṣam api yady ekaṃ kṣīṇadoṣe kariṣyasi |
GR13bhnstcau:236: padaṃ citte tadā śambho kiṃ na sampādayiṣyasi || 114
GR13bhnstcau:238: bhavet sālambanā tasya yas tvadālambanaḥ prabho || 115
GR13bhnstcau:239: śubhāśubhasya sarvasya svayaṃ kartā bhavān api |
GR13bhnstcau:241: prasanne manasi svāmin kiṃ tvaṃ niviśase kim u |
GR13bhnstcau:242: tvatpraveśāt prasīdet tad iti dolāyate janaḥ || 117
GR13bhnstcau:243: niścayaḥ punar eṣo 'tra tvadadhiṣṭhānam eva hi |
GR13bhnstcau:244: prasādo manasaḥ svāmin sā siddhis tat paraṃ padam || 118
GR13bhnstcau:245: vacaś cetaś ca kāryaṃ ca śarīraṃ mama yat prabho |
